content: पायस {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (सी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [पयसो विकारः अण्] Made of water or milk. --सः, --सं {@--1@} Rice boiled in milk; <ls>Ms. 3. 271</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">5. 7</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 173.</ls> {@--2@} Turpentine. {@--3@} An oblation of milk, rice, and sugar. --सं {@--1@} Milk. {@--2@} Ambrosia, nectar.
